content:
本件保存
會員委設建 庫 水 門石 SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
SDC - 5112
May 12, 1962
年
Mr. K. T. Li, Secretary-General Council for United States Aid 118 Hwaining Street Taipei, Taiwan
Subject: GSA Surplus Equipment Lorraine Truck Crane
Dear Mr. Li:
Please refer to the attached copy of Mr. G. C. Johnson's letter MK-1492 dated May 11, 1962 on the above subject.
It is recommended by MKA that one 20 ton truck crane which is now at the BES yard in Taipei is urgently required by Shihmen Project for meeting the construction requirements.
140.112.213.8.2
We, therefore, request your consideration to allocate this equip- ment to Shihmen Project on priority of need basis. It is also to be noted that such equipment allocated to Shihmen will be released for the use of other agencies after eight months of time.
Your action on the above will be highly appreciated.
1
Very truly yours, SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
W. 1. 1Km W. K. Ku Chief Engineer
51.5. 15
09590
72 2
V.O.
S.G.
Enclosure 4
(2)
cc : Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/M Mr. G. C. Johnson, MKA
STCC/mw
CUNAJE
國史饭 Academia Historica
354

paragraphs.content: 會員委設建 庫 水 門石 SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
Mr. K. T. Li, Secretary-General Council for United States Aid 118 Hwaining Street Taipei, Taiwan
Subject: GSA Surplus Equipment Lorraine Truck Crane
Please refer to the attached copy of Mr. G. C. Johnson's letter MK-1492 dated May 11, 1962 on the above subject.
It is recommended by MKA that one 20 ton truck crane which is now at the BES yard in Taipei is urgently required by Shihmen Project for meeting the construction requirements.

We, therefore, request your consideration to allocate this equip- ment to Shihmen Project on priority of need basis. It is also to be noted that such equipment allocated to Shihmen will be released for the use of other agencies after eight months of time.
Your action on the above will be highly appreciated.
Very truly yours, SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
W. 1. 1Km W. K. Ku Chief Engineer
cc : Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/M Mr. G. C. Johnson, MKA
